name: Sendwise
description: Smart Batch Transfers for ETH & ERC20 Tokens. Send multiple transactions in one go, save gas fees, and streamline your crypto payments. Perfect for airdrops, payroll, and bulk payments.

screenshots.alt: Sendwise Batch Transfer Interface - Clean and intuitive UI for sending multiple transactions
Sendwise CSV Import Feature - Easy bulk import from CSV files
Sendwise Transaction History - Track all your batch transfers

publishing.reviewNotes: Sendwise is a fully functional batch transfer application that allows users to send ETH and ERC20 tokens to multiple addresses in a single transaction. The app is optimized for gas savings and provides a seamless user experience within the Farcaster ecosystem.
publishing.targetAudience: Crypto users, DeFi participants, project teams, and anyone who needs to send multiple transactions efficiently.
